product_name: REI Timber Mountain Ski Mittens - Kids'
long_description: The waterproof and breathable REI Timber Mountain ski mittens for kids help keep young snow rider's hands toasty warm and dry all day long, and after dark when the night-ski lights come on. Durable nylon shells sport waterproof, breathable inserts and warm Thinsulate lining; polyester insulation adds warmth without bulkiness. Gauntlet wrists; reflective trim; wrist leashes.
short_description: The waterproof and breathable REI Timber Mountain ski mittens for kids help keep young snow rider's hands toasty warm and dry all day long, and after dark when the night-ski lights come on.
